## assertValue() function

Assert an `<input>` element having a certain value (after a wait if necessary).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function assertValue(input: ElementHandle, expected: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | ElementHandle | A puppeteer handle to an input element. |
|  expected | string | The value that is expected to be present. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
